text: Graham John Cawthorne (born 30 September 1958) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Harworth Colliery F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Spalding United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Graham Cawthorne
